evidence.text:
Person B: I'm Faith Killebrew a prosecutor with the District Attorney’s Office. Can we talk?
Person B: Sorry for the intrusion. I won't be long. I'm following up on a possible hit and run from last October, just doing a routine check on any cars that were serviced for major body damage around that time.
Person B: Do you remember having body work done on it around that time?
Person B: And how was your car damaged?
Person B: You're sure?
Person B: Could it have been Old Quarry Road?
Person B: You're positive?
